=How to build js object?=

Use syntax {{{new%js}}}:

Example:

<<code language="ocaml"|
let get_timestamp () =
  let date = new%js Js.date_now in
  int_of_float (Js.to_float (date##getTime))
>>

More details in documentation: [[wiki(72):js_of_ocaml/api/Js#2_Objectconstructors|Js object constructor]]
